rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Entryway with ample space for reception and coat closet. Oriented towards the main entrance following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjoining the courtyard view to maximize natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: kitchenette
rooms.description: Functional kitchen integrated with dining space. Designed for efficient workflow per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: utility_room
rooms.description: Storage area adjacent to the living room and kitchen, housing cleaning supplies and laundry equipment.

rooms.name: bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom; positioned in the northeast as per Vastu recommendations for positive energy.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom adjacent to the main bedroom, designed for privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: study_room
rooms.description: Workspace with access to natural light from the courtyard view. Ideal for work or meditation per Vastu guidelines.
